> Posted by CurseForge user Jalopyy

A tempting offer. How about this instead - Its a way to do this properly!:

http://i.imgur.com/WQ8GLyR.png

In 8.0.0, you will be able to set the All Usable opacity to 100% and the Any Usable opacity to 0%. This way, the icon will only show as usable if all the spells tracked are usable.

Currently, your icon doesn't work as configured because while freezing trap is unusable, ice trap is always going to be usable (or, at least the icon thinks it is as far as it is concerned - it has no knowledge of how hunters work). The icon sees a usable spell and also sees that you're interested in usable spells, so it goes OOHWEE and displays that usable spell.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

In that case I'll just remove ice trap, nobody uses it anyway.
